description.en:
LeagueDAO is a community-driven initiative which aims to merge the concepts of decentralization and tokenization with fantasy sports.

LeagueDAO enables a global community of fans to collectively play, build, and define the future of fantasy gaming.

LeagueDAO includes play-to-earn gaming, and NFTs to create a web3 fantasy gaming reality where users can own and trade the players on their team and where on-chain scoring is based on real-world stats.
